name: Themeum Page Builder WooCommerce Addon
author: Fahim Murshed

sections.description: WP Page Builder has no built in WooComerce addon. This is simple WP Page Builder addon for WooComerce. You can make a beafutiful shop page with this plugin.
sections.installation:
Search on the plugins “WP Page Builder WooCommerce Addon” and install/activate.

or

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
sections.faq:
What is WP Page Builder?

WP Page Builder is a free drag and drop WordPress page builder to create websites easily. Whether youâ€™re an experienced developer or just a beginner, you can build stunning websites independently with this tool. Create beautiful web pages effortlessly using the intuitive live page composer without coding in minutes. No design experience needed.

More info: WP Page Builder

Can I use the plugin without WP Page Builder?

No, this plugin works only with WP Page Builder.

Any theme supported?

Yes, you can use this plugin with any theme.
